title: Qlick Gaming: Looking for a D5+ TOP Main for OOL Team

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hello ALL! We are currently looking for a dedicated toplaner that is available in the evenings with a strong champ pool, and willing to work on their current pool to stay up to date with the meta, as the organization we are greatly passionate about wanting to be the best, so if you feel you could be a great addition to us. please do not hesitate to apply. Preferably D5+ however all applications will be taken into consideration
all those that wish to apply can either message manko manko in-game or email management@qlickgaming.com

Look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
Manko Manko
Team Captain
Qlick Gaming
